description: This file defines the React component 'NoteList', which renders a sorted list of note items, handling the display order based on pinned status and update time, and managing user selection interactions.

methods.name: NoteList({ notes, activeId, onSelect })
methods.description: React component that renders a list of notes sorted with pinned notes first and then by recent updates.
